basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (MIC>80 µM in L.B, P.B), Bacillus megaterium (MIC>80 µM in L.B, P.B);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coliD22 (MIC=0.3 µM in L.B, P.B), A.tumefaciens (MIC=1.25 µM in LB and 3 µM in PB), Salmonella typhimurium (MIC=5 µM in L.B and 10 µM in P.B).
